He's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly," Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter. At$ 8.44 billion, Google's fourth-quarter revenue jumped 26 percent from a year earlier. standing of Zahi Hawass . He has no doubt that his fame is a vital national asset." And it's an asset likely to carry over even if the Mubarak government falls, Parker says. Music mogul Simon Cowell , who got engaged to make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last year, loves children but says he is getting too old to have them. I worry about it because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70... "Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that.
